name: Portfolio Web
description: A modern portfolio showcasing web and digital projects with detailed insights into creative solutions and skills. A reflection of dedication to digital excellence.

name: Alka's Telecom
description: A landing page for Alka's Telecom, a fictitious telecom company offering cutting-edge mobile plans and devices. Designed with a focus on user experience, the site invites visitors to explore services through an intuitive and visually appealing interface.

name: Alka's Supermarket
description: An internal system designed for the sales staff of Alka's Supermarket, a fictitious supermarket. The focus is on service efficiency, featuring tables for product management, invoice tracking, and salesperson performance.
